name: io.cordova.hellosentrycordova
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.
author: Sentry Team and Contributors

scripts.platforms:add: cordova platform add ios && cordova platform add android && cordova platform add browser
scripts.platforms:remove: cordova platform rm ios && cordova platform rm android && cordova platform rm browser
scripts.reset-ios: cordova platform rm ios && cordova platform add ios
